alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 6:30AM AKST until January 14 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Light snow has begun and will continue into the weekend across the northern panhandle. 4 to 6 inches of snow has fallen from Gustavus to Juneau by 6 am. Snowfall rates will gradually increase in intensity through the weekend as well. Snow has started dry and fluffy but may become wetter and heavier as temperatures warm through the weekend. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 9 to 12 inches. Snowfall rates of 0.75 to 1.5 inches/hour are possible through the day. * WHERE...Glacier Bay, Eastern Chichagof Island and City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult and is discouraged unless it is an emergency. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light dry snow will accumulate quickly through the day.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay
